pkgmetadata.longdescription: Different Numeric Optimizations to Estimate Parameter Coefficients // There are different numeric optimizations which are used in order to estimate coefficients in models such as linear regression and neural networks. This package covers parameter estimation in linear regression using different methods such as batch gradient descent, stochastic gradient descent, minibatch gradient descent and coordinate descent. Kiwiel, Krzysztof C (2001) doi:10.1007/PL00011414 Yu Nesterov (2004) ISBN:1-4020-7553-7 Ferguson, Thomas S (1982) doi:10.1080/01621459.1982.10477894 Zeiler, Matthew D (2012) arXiv:1212.5701 Wright, Stephen J (2015) arXiv:1502.04759.
